item.title: Xueshan Chen
item.description: scyxc3@nottingham.edu.cn · +86 138 8722 7838 Ningbo, China EXPERIENCE Jumbox Front End Engineer - Ningbo Developing and maintaining Wechat mini programs and web pages. I had developed a mini program called ”banana”, which once had more than 2000 users. October 2020 to February 2021 M5 Front End Engineer - Ningbo Maintaining back-management system and develop an online mall system. Write back-end code using framework ”Spring Boot”, complete front and back end alignment and iteration of products.
